channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 00:04 Air anxiety in the Uman District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 00:04 Air anxiety in the Uman District Surveat for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 00:04 Air alarm in Zvenigorod district to care for further reports.
item.description: 游댮 00:04 Air alarm in Zvenigorod district to care for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
